name: The dimmed Morningstar (2h)
data: It has magnificent weapon class for its type (magnificent in general).
It increases the users strength slightly.
It decreases the users physical resistance somewhat.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It gives decent bonus to the skill 'smash'.
It increases the users cold resistance somewhat.
It increases damage like a god.
It does cold damage like a god.
It increases the users fire resistance somewhat.
